content:
Hello,
For this issue (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/81576)
I have a type which is an ADT with generic parameters "path::Example<i32, _ , ... >", is there a way to print this type as "path::Example<_, _ , ... >" simpler that string manipulation ? in the surrounding code that I modify there is this rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::FnCtxt::ty_to_string that prints "path::Example<i32, _ , ... >", is there something similar for what I need ?
